message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: A person match search criterion with the same Name already exists. Name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REFERENCE_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: A person match search criterion with the same Reference already exists. Reference must be unique.

message.name: ERR_FV_REFERENCE_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Reference entered is too long. Maximum allowed is %1n.

message.name: ERR_FV_WEIGHT_MUST_BE_POSITIVE_WHOLE_NUMBER
message.locale: 'Weight' must be a positive whole number.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REFERENCE_OR_SEARCH_INDEX_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Reference must be entered or a Search Index selected.
